channel.title: Whip has no spec
channel.description: Ok, my whip on my Exion {PI} source has no spec bar, how can i fix this? and my g maul has a spec bar but wont spec.. how can i fix this... AND MY D HALLY ONLY HITS once WHEN IT SPECS.. HOW DO I FIX THIS ALSO?
